Articles.Content: Hey Kerbonauts, I've seen this question asked before but the most recent think I've seen is about a year old. My question is whether or not there is a way, mod or otherwise, to make the VAB bigger. Unless I've missed it, the Kerbal Editor Tools hasn't been updated and I haven't come across any other mods or tricks. I ask because I'm designing a Jool-5 mission, but am including a full space station to leave in orbit on top of it, and the current VAB just doesn't have enough room for me to see the whole station before I put it together in orbit, which would probably just result in me missing some crucial thing . Thanks!
M8 I have the perfect mod for you to use it makes the VAB and SPH invisible if you press the buttonin the building taskbar thing
This is going to end up being a modding question, and so it has been moved to the modding subforum.

Natokerbal, Thank you! that is exactly what I needed. You are a scholar

Edited September 1, 2017 by Doctor Holman
